name: Magical technique Generator
explanation: Magical techniques for magic tables. Subtables have been sorted from common to rare. Subtables present energies known in different types of genres and worlds. The first subtables are compatible with the largest number of  worlds, and get more specialized towards the end. Non-generic subtables are not called by default to retain compatibility with most settings. Some subtables intentionally overlap. Author: Esko Vesala. Sources: Wikipedia.org.
